<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F7FA" android:padding="20dp" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mood Journal" android:textSize="32sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#2D3748" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Track your emotional wellness" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="#718096" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" />
<!-- Quick Mood Entry Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:text="Quick Mood Entry" android:textColor="#2D3748" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Mood Buttons Row --> <HorizontalScrollView android:id="@+id/moodehorizotal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:fillViewport="true" android:scrollbars="none">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp">
<!-- Ecstatic --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutEcstatic" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_selector_background" android:gravity="center" android:minWidth="80dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btnVeryHappy" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_button_circle" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="28sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Ecstatic" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Very Happy --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutVeryHappy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_selector_background" android:gravity="center" android:minWidth="80dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btnHappy" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_button_circle" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="28sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Very" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Excited --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutExcited" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_selector_background" android:gravity="center" android:minWidth="80dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btnExcited" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_button_circle" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="28sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Excited" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Happy --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutHappy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_selector_background" android:gravity="center" android:minWidth="80dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btnNeutral" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_button_circle" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="28sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Happy" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Content --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutContent" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_selector_background" android:gravity="center" android:minWidth="80dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btnSad" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_button_circle" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="28sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Content" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Upset --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutUpset" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_selector_background" android:gravity="center" android:minWidth="80dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btnVerySad" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_button_circle" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="28sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Upset" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Add more mood options here if needed --> <!-- Sad --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutSad" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_selector_background" android:gravity="center" android:minWidth="80dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btnSadMood" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_button_circle" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="28sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Sad" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Angry --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutAngry" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_selector_background" android:gravity="center" android:minWidth="80dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/btnAngry" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/mood_button_circle" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="28sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="Angry" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</HorizontalScrollView>
<!-- Action Buttons Row --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnDetailedEntry" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@drawable/button_primary" android:text="✏️ Detailed Entry" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="14sp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnShareMood" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@drawable/button_secondary" android:text=" Share" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="14sp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Hidden Elements for Detailed Entry --> <EditText android:id="@+id/etMoodNote" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="120dp" android:hint="How are you feeling today? What's on your mind?" android:gravity="top" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:maxLines="5" android:background="@drawable/edittext_background" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="gone" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCharCount" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="0/500 characters" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:gravity="end" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="gone" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSaveMood" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Save Mood Entry" android:textSize="16sp" android:backgroundTint="#F57C00" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:visibility="gone" />
<!-- View Toggle Buttons --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/hover" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnListView" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@drawable/button_outline_gray" android:text=" List View" android:textColor="#0B0B0B" android:textSize="14sp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnCalendarView" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@drawable/button_outline_gray" android:text=" Calendar" android:textColor="#4A5568" android:textSize="14sp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Calendar View Container --> <include android:id="@+id/calendarView" layout="@layout/calendar_view" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" />
<!-- Quick Stats --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTotalEntries" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="1" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#2D3748" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Total Entries" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#718096" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTodayEntries" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="1" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#2D3748" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Today" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#718096" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvWeeksTracked" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="1" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#2D3748" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Weeks Tracked" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#718096" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Mood History Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Recent Mood Entries" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#2D3748" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<!-- Mood History --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvMoodHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="true" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>
